titleInfo.title: THE PHASE-TRANSITION TO THE QUARK-GLUON PLASMA - RECENT RESULTS FROM LATTICE CALCULATIONS

mods.abstract: We will discuss here some of the recent results obtained from lattice simulations of QCD at non-zero temperature. Such calculations aim at a quantitative understanding of the thermodynamics of strongly interacting matter in equilibrium. We concentrate on a discussion of the equation of state, the chiral transition in two-flavour QCD and hadronic properties related to chiral symmetry restoration in the vicinity of T-c.
